description:
Talking matter researches the materials that different types of bells are made of.The first episode is simply and introduction to the podcast series, where the every next episode represents each material that has been mentioned in the first episode - Ceramic, Metal and Glass.

This is more of an interactive podcast, where the listener has to participate and follow the intructions they hear. Each material produces a different sound, creating a language, that is transferred into body movements. The publications are manuals, detailed instructions, on each single movement that the listener has to perform.
